[scenario]
clients=client10026;client10027
import=end-of-header.txt
actions=body-skip-first;body-skip-second;end-of-message

[client10026]
port=10026
arguments=--action;skip;--body;Skip first

[client10027]
port=10027
arguments=--action;skip;--body;Skip second

[body-skip-first]
command=body

chunk=Skip first

response=body
n_received=2
status=continue

[body-skip-second]
command=body

chunk=Skip second

response=body
n_received=1
status=skip

[end-of-message]
command=end-of-message

response=end-of-message
n_received=2
status=continue
